command.text: SELECT Regbussstudent.Regbussstudentid, Regbussstudent.busid, bus.name_1 AS busname_1, Regbussstudent.schareaid, scharea.Desc1 AS schareaDesc1, Regbussstudent.standerdprice, Regbussstudent.notes, Regbussstudent.transdate, Regbussstudent.startdate, Regbussstudent.enddate, Regbussstudent.periodpermonth, Regbussstudent.AmountDiscount, Regbussstudent.Amountadded, Regbussstudent.TotalAmount, Regbussstudent.StudentCode, Student.SchstCivilidnumber AS StudentSchstCivilidnumber, Student.FirstName1, Studentarea.Desc1 AS StudentareaDesc1, Studentbranch.Desc1 AS StudentbranchDesc1, Studentbranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS Studentbranchsgmsgm_Nm, StudentbranchGender.Gender AS StudentbranchGenderGender, Studentbranchstage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentbranchstageShortDesc1, Studentbranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS StudentbranchschtypschtypDesc, StudentCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentGender.Gender AS StudentGenderGender, StudentReligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentReligionReljan_nm, Studentstate.State_Nm AS StudentstateState_Nm, Studentid.name_1 AS Studentidname_1, Studentacd.AcademicYear AS StudentacdAcademicYear, StudentacdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS StudentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, StudentClass.ClassDesc1 AS StudentClassClassDesc1, StudentSchclasskind.Schclasskinddesc AS StudentSchclasskindSchclasskinddesc, StudentFather.fathfirstname1 AS StudentFatherfathfirstname1, StudentFatherMaritalStatus.Status_Nm AS StudentFatherMaritalStatusStatus_Nm, StudentFatherarea.Desc1 AS StudentFatherareaDesc1, StudentFatherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentFatherCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentFatherreligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentFatherreligionReljan_nm, StudentFatherState.State_Nm AS StudentFatherStateState_Nm, StudentFatherjob_.job_desc AS StudentFatherjob_job_desc, StudentGrade.ShortDesc1 AS StudentGradeShortDesc1, StudentGradeacd.AcademicYear AS StudentGradeacdAcademicYear, StudentGradeStage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentGradeStageShortDesc1, StudentMother.firstname1 AS StudentMotherfirstname1, StudentMotherarea.Desc1 AS StudentMotherareaDesc1, StudentMotherCntry_.Cntry_Nm AS StudentMotherCntry_Cntry_Nm, StudentMotherreligion.Reljan_nm AS StudentMotherreligionReljan_nm, StudentMotherState.State_Nm AS StudentMotherStateState_Nm, StudentMotherjob_.job_desc AS StudentMotherjob_job_desc, StudentStage.ShortDesc1 AS StudentStageShortDesc1, Studentschstatus_.schstatus_name AS Studentschstatus_schstatus_name, Studentschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgDesc AS StudentschstclasskinddmgschstclasskinddmgDesc, Studentschstspl.schstsplDsc AS StudentschstsplschstsplDsc, Studentschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseDesc AS StudentschsthlthcaseschsthlthcaseDesc, Studentstudentsefa.studentsefaar AS Studentstudentsefastudentsefaar, Studentstudentsefadebitaccount.Acc_Nm AS StudentstudentsefadebitaccountAcc_Nm, Studentschstudenttyp.schstudenttyp AS Studentschstudenttypschstudenttyp, StudentSchtransfer.SchtransferDesc AS StudentSchtransferSchtransferDesc, Regbussstudent.branch, Thebranch.Desc1 AS ThebranchDesc1, Thebranchsgm.sgm_Nm AS Thebranchsgmsgm_Nm, ThebranchsgmOpco.OpcoName AS ThebranchsgmOpcoOpcoName, ThebranchGender.Gender AS ThebranchGenderGender, Thebranchstage.ShortDesc1 AS ThebranchstageShortDesc1, Thebranchschtyp.schtypDesc AS ThebranchschtypschtypDesc, Regbussstudent.Stage, Stage.ShortDesc1 AS StageShortDesc1, Regbussstudent.GradeCode, Grade.ShortDesc1 AS GradeShortDesc1, Gradeacd.AcademicYear AS GradeacdAcademicYear, GradeacdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS GradeacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, GradeStage.ShortDesc1 AS GradeStageShortDesc1, Regbussstudent.Class, Class.ClassDesc1 AS ClassClassDesc1, Regbussstudent.acdcode, acd.AcademicYear AS acdAcademicYear, acdGlFinperiod.Fin_period_info AS acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info, acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber.Acc_Nm AS acdGlFinperiodaccountnumberAcc_Nm, Regbussstudent.ModifiedBy, Regbussstudent.ModifiedByUserId, Regbussstudent.ModifiedOn, Regbussstudent.CreatedBy, Regbussstudent.CreatedById, Regbussstudent.CreatedOn, Regbussstudent.AmountDiscountnote, Regbussstudent.Amountaddednote, Regbussstudent.Subscriptionstatus, TheSubscriptionstatus.SubscriptionstatusDesc AS TheSubscriptionstatusSubscriptionstatusDesc, Regbussstudent.Subscriptionstopeddate, Regbussstudent.Restperiodpermonth, Regbussstudent.RestTotalAmount, Regbussstudent.firstinstallmentamount, Regbussstudent.firstinstallmentdate, Regbussstudent.secondinstallmentamount1, Regbussstudent.secondinstallmentdate1, dbo.Qglschtransbalance.trcr1, dbo.Qglschtransbalance.Trdb1, dbo.Qglschtransbalance.Balance, bus.name_2, bus.drive_name, bus.drive_phone, bus.bus_no,Regbussstudent.gomorning,Regbussstudent.backafternono,Regbussstudent.clubway FROM dbo.Regbussstudent AS Regbussstudent LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Qglschtransbalance ON Regbussstudent.StudentCode = dbo.Qglschtransbalance.StudentCode AND Regbussstudent.branch = dbo.Qglschtransbalance.branch AND Regbussstudent.acdcode = dbo.Qglschtransbalance.acdcode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.reg_bus AS bus ON Regbussstudent.busid = bus.id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS scharea ON Regbussstudent.schareaid = scharea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchStudent AS Student ON Regbussstudent.StudentCode = Student.StudentCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS Studentarea ON Student.area = Studentarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Studentbranch ON Student.branch = Studentbranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS Studentbranchsgm ON Studentbranch.sgm = Studentbranchsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentbranchGender ON Studentbranch.Genderid = StudentbranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS Studentbranchstage ON Studentbranch.stagecode = Studentbranchstage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Studentbranchschtyp ON Studentbranch.schtypid = Studentbranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentCntry_ ON Student.Cntry_No = StudentCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS StudentGender ON Student.Genderid = StudentGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentReligion ON Student.Religion = StudentReligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS Studentstate ON Student.state = Studentstate.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.reg_other_schools AS Studentid ON Student.id = Studentid.id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS Studentacd ON Student.acdcode = Studentacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS StudentacdGlFinperiod ON Studentacd.GlFinperiodID = StudentacdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schClassConfig AS StudentClass ON Student.Class = StudentClass.classcode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schclasskindlist AS StudentSchclasskind ON Student.Schclasskindid = StudentSchclasskind.Schclasskindid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schFather AS StudentFather ON Student.FatherCode = StudentFather.FatherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyStatus AS StudentFatherMaritalStatus ON StudentFather.MaritalStatus = StudentFatherMaritalStatus.Status_Type LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentFatherarea ON StudentFather.area = StudentFatherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentFatherCntry_ ON StudentFather.Cntry_No = StudentFatherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentFatherreligion ON StudentFather.religion = StudentFatherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentFatherState ON StudentFather.State = StudentFatherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchFatherjob AS StudentFatherjob_ ON StudentFather.job_no = StudentFatherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schGrade AS StudentGrade ON Student.GradeCode = StudentGrade.GradeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS StudentGradeacd ON StudentGrade.acdcode = StudentGradeacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentGradeStage ON StudentGrade.StageCode = StudentGradeStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schMother AS StudentMother ON Student.MotherCode = StudentMother.MotherCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schArea AS StudentMotherarea ON StudentMother.area = StudentMotherarea.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PYCntry AS StudentMotherCntry_ ON StudentMother.Cntry_No = StudentMotherCntry_.Cntry_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyReljan AS StudentMotherreligion ON StudentMother.religion = StudentMotherreligion.reljan LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyState AS StudentMotherState ON StudentMother.State = StudentMotherState.State LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SchMotherjob AS StudentMotherjob_ ON StudentMother.job_no = StudentMotherjob_.job_no LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS StudentStage ON Student.Stage = StudentStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstatus AS Studentschstatus_ ON Student.schstatus_code = Studentschstatus_.schstatus_code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstclasskinddmg AS Studentschstclasskinddmg ON Student.schstclasskinddmgid = Studentschstclasskinddmg.schstclasskinddmgid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstespetialest AS Studentschstspl ON Student.schstsplid = Studentschstspl.schstsplid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schsthealthcase AS Studentschsthlthcase ON Student.schsthlthcaseid = Studentschsthlthcase.schsthlthcaseid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schstudentsefa AS Studentstudentsefa ON Student.studentsefa = Studentstudentsefa.studentsefaid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS Studentstudentsefadebitaccount ON Studentstudentsefa.debitaccount = Studentstudentsefadebitaccount.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schstudenttyp AS Studentschstudenttyp ON Student.schstudenttypid = Studentschstudenttyp.schstudenttypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Schtransferlist AS StudentSchtransfer ON Student.Schtransferid = StudentSchtransfer.Schtransferid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schBranch AS Thebranch ON Regbussstudent.branch = Thebranch.branch LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.glmulcmp AS Thebranchsgm ON Thebranch.sgm = Thebranchsgm.sgmid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.OpCo AS ThebranchsgmOpco ON Thebranchsgm.OpcoID = ThebranchsgmOpco.OpcoIDidentity LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.PyGender AS ThebranchGender ON Thebranch.Genderid = ThebranchGender.Genderid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS Thebranchstage ON Thebranch.stagecode = Thebranchstage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schtyp AS Thebranchschtyp ON Thebranch.schtypid = Thebranchschtyp.schtypid LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS Stage ON Regbussstudent.Stage = Stage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schGrade AS Grade ON Regbussstudent.GradeCode = Grade.GradeCode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS Gradeacd ON Grade.acdcode = Gradeacd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS GradeacdGlFinperiod ON Gradeacd.GlFinperiodID = GradeacdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schStage AS GradeStage ON Grade.StageCode = GradeStage.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schClassConfig AS Class ON Regbussstudent.Class = Class.classcode LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.schAcademicyear AS acd ON Regbussstudent.acdcode = acd.Code LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GlFinanceperiod AS acdGlFinperiod ON acd.GlFinperiodID = acdGlFinperiod.GlFinperiodID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.GLmstrfl AS acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber ON acdGlFinperiod.accountnumber = acdGlFinperiodaccountnumber.Acc_No LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Subscriptionstatuslist AS TheSubscriptionstatus ON Regbussstudent.Subscriptionstatus = TheSubscriptionstatus.Subscriptionstatus

field.name: StudentacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: Studentacd Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: GradeacdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: Gradeacd Gl Finperiod Fin period info

field.name: acdGlFinperiodFin_period_info
field.label: acd Gl Finperiod Fin period info
